Package com.github.actionfx.core.utils

Class MethodInvocationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.utils.MethodInvocationAdapter
  • public class MethodInvocationAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Adapter for invoking methods with variable method arguments.

    This adapter tries to find the best match for method arguments based on a supplied list of ParameterValues. In case two method arguments have the same type, the annotation AFXArgHint is evaluated for some further hints, which value to take for which method argument.

    Author:
    koster

      Nested Classes

      static class  MethodInvocationAdapter.ParameterValue
      A representation of a method parameter, together with a ParameterHint

    • Field Detail

      • PARAMETER_NAME_FRAGMENT_OLD

        public static final java.lang.String PARAMETER_NAME_FRAGMENT_OLD
        String fragment of a method argument that represents the "old" value. Requires the compiler to preserve argument names. If this is not the case, use AFXArgHint annotation on method arguments.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAMETER_NAME_FRAGMENT_NEW

        public static final java.lang.String PARAMETER_NAME_FRAGMENT_NEW
        String fragment of a method argument that represents the "new" value. Requires the compiler to preserve argument names. If this is not the case, use AFXArgHint annotation on method arguments.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MethodInvocationAdapter

        public MethodInvocationAdapter​(java.lang.Object instance,
                               java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                               java.lang.Object... availableParameterValues)
        Constructor that accepts a method together with the holding instance and candidates for method arguments.
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance holding the method
        method - the method to execute
        availableParameterValues - parameter candidates

      • MethodInvocationAdapter

        public MethodInvocationAdapter​(java.lang.Object instance,
                               java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                               MethodInvocationAdapter.ParameterValue... availableParameterValues)
        Constructor that accepts a method together with the holding instance and candidates for method arguments of type MethodInvocationAdapter.ParameterValue. Use this constructor, if you have two method arguments of the same type, while you want to distinguish between the two values (e.g. "old value" and "new value").
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance holding the method
        method - the method to execute
        availableParameterValues - parameter candidates
